response.original_title: 話したりない夜の果て  Days gone by
response.overview: Since the day her heart broke, Taeko has forgotten how to get back on her feet. Drifting through each day, using the past as an excuse, she has lost the will to live in the present. As her relationship with Kotarō, the boyfriend she had depended on emotionally and in daily life, begins to change, Taeko is finally forced to confront what lies within her own heart.
response.title: 話したりない夜の果て  Days gone by
